built: next-task.sh: atomic claim of next unblocked pending task via UPDATE WHERE subquery
next-review.sh: polls completed tasks without code_review entries
check-phase-status.sh: phase stats with per-plan breakdown in TOON and JSON
claim-task.sh: explicit task claiming with changes() atomicity check
release-task.sh: unclaim with optional retry reason in gaps table
db_helper.bash: shared test helper for all DB unit tests
sg: Consider adding --timeout flag to next-task.sh for polling loops
Consider adding dept column to plans table for proper --dept filtering
